message.body: So what do you wanna do on Friday
Well we may end up doing a little Christmas shopping since I'm behind already haha. But we'll get some food and catch up and stuff
Haha no worries I am an expert shopper :p sounds good to me :)
What time is good for you?
Hey I think around 12-ish 1ish is good , what do you think?
That's good with me! When do you have to go home?
I don't have any other plans
So we can party allll niiiight loooong
Lmaoo should I bring my disco ball?
Lmao obviously. Well are you gonna be by school? Or should we meet up in Brooklyn?
(1/2) Hey don't hate my please I just got a cAll from a research company interview at 2 in midtown so can we meet up after that , I don't think it will be long
(2/2) but we can def meet afterward
Oh ok that sounds awesome! I will meet you after that. Good luck! Where is the interview?
Ok, thank you!! its on 34th st , I'm freakin out lol
Don't worry you will be great just take deep breaths and relax!!!
Hahah thank you :) ima bring my paper baggy to breath into lol
